creditline: The Kenneth and Elayne Hengler Endowment for Art Acquisition, the William Hood Dunwoody Fund, and gift of Anthony d'Offay
text: A group of 6 objects of various metals - copper alloy, iron, and bronze - in a variety of forms. They include a yak horn-shaped seed dispenser; two ceremonial knives (one with a crescent-shaped blade, and one with a wave-like shape); and three small metal objects in the form of stupas with bell-like domes.
title: Makara-headed magic horn
